body: At 4th level, the favor of a deity or religious institution grants a special blessing on a sanctified rogue, shoring up some of her weaknesses. She gains a +1 sacred bonus on Fortitude and Will saving throws. This ability replaces uncanny dodge.
name: Divine Purpose
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Rogue/Rogue Archetypes/Sanctified Rogue/Divine Purpose
